## What we had to do???

```js
const a = require('biscuits')
```

### API

#### Biscuits(name, thing)

* `name` [`<String>`][] The biscuit name
* `thing` [`<Array>`][] The biscuit's kids


[`<Array>`]: https://mdn.io/array
[`<String>`]: https://mdn.io/string
